        Parameters:
        gc - The GraphicsContext to use. All graphics will be placed here
        mouseHandler - The mouse handler to user input
        name - The name of the Map
        rows - The number of rows in the Map
        rows - The number of rows in the Map
        columns - The number of columns in the Map
